outputs.output_descr: The overall purpose of UNAIDS Country team is to support and strengthen country level capacities to scale up national programmes towards the achievement of the universal access to prevention, treatment, care and support. More specifically the UCC will strengthen support for country level actions on HIV and AIDS through: a) providing direct support to the UN system at country level to develop and implement the UN system programme of support on AIDS; and b) mobilize regional and partnerships to support country level action on HIV.

donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: Equipments provided and staff trained in planning and coordination at all levels

project_descr: UNAIDS Programme implemented in South Sudan
